name: Once Upon A Time On Mars
name_original: Once Upon A Time On Mars
description:
Strangers from another world have abducted your cattle. It's high time they found out why you're called the fastest gun in the West - Make them pay!

My solo submission to the California Collegiate Game Jam (UCSD represent!). Conceptualized, drawn, programmed, composed, and tested by yours truly in 48 hours.

Game programmed in Unity. Original music composed in Famitracker, and all sounds graciously borrowed from freesound.org. Pixel art made in Libresprite, an open source pixel art software
